name: Catholic Recruiter Associates
description: This firm specializes in retained executive search for Catholic organizations, focusing on finding highly qualified executives who align with Catholic culture. They have been in business for over thirty years and have a high success rate in placements
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Partners in Mission
description: This organization provides search and recruitment services for Catholic organizations, including schools and dioceses. They focus on finding Catholic leaders who can cultivate a thriving Catholic school culture
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Archdiocese of St. Louis
description: The Archdiocese of St. Louis has a Recruiter - Sourcing Specialist role focused on supporting the recruitment and retention of individuals serving the Catholic Church's ministries, parishes, and schools
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Catholic Charities of Kansas City-St. Joseph
description: This organization offers employment services, including job readiness training, resume assistance, and job search support, to help vulnerable populations find and keep work
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Catholic Charities of Central and Northern Missouri
description: Their Employment Services assist refugees in finding employment by providing job search coaching, resume building, and interview guidance
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Catholic Charities of Southern Missouri
description: This organization has employment opportunities within their own services and aims to attract, develop, and retain a talented workforce
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation

name: Catholic Charities of St. Louis
description: Their Workforce Development program includes job readiness training, resume writing, interview preparation, and connects clients to employment opportunities, including a Trades Program for construction careers
services: Catholic-owned Retained recruiting in Missouri consultation
